General.Name: Jilin Yatai Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Jilin Yatai (Group) Co., Ltd. engages in the building materials business in China. It is also involved in the real estate development, coal wholesale, and pharmaceutical production businesses, as well as financial investment business. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Changchun, China.
